alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 13 at 2:25PM MDT until April 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Animas River Basin. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
